cv.name: Smion Đurđević
cv.title: Engineering Manager
cv.summary: Experienced Engineering Manager and Tech Lead with over 20 years in software development, specializing in .NET, C#, SQL, and team leadership. Currently leading multiple development teams and implementing AI technologies across products.

job1.title: Engineering Manager
job1.description: Leading multiple development teams, planning resources for development projects and upgrades. Defining SDLC and implementing guidelines, creating documentation and testing forms. Implementing SCRUM methodology through adapted ceremonies. Implementing Q&A through manual testing definitions, test automation, and regression testing. Monthly 1:1 meetings with team members, defining career development paths. Currently establishing AI technology department for implementation across all products.

job2.title: Tech Lead
job2.description: Leading development team using SCRUM methodology. Daily team member tracking through daily meetings. Participating in multi-month sprint planning using Miro board. Code review through TFS combined with GIT system. Daily work in Visual Studio with .NET, C#, and databases using SqlDbx, AQT and SMSS tools. Development of web services and testing.

job3.title: Team Lead
job3.description: Leading development team, defining daily tasks. Team member tracking through daily meetings. Implementing Dynamic CRM in cloud. Developing CRM integrations with external systems. Daily work on SQL stored procedures. Preparing for transition to scalable systems (Docker, Kubernetes). Implementing Azure infrastructure and TFS Azure services. Introducing Git for easier source code management.
